properties.name: config.account-recovery-time
properties.description: The time in days that a user has to recover their account after it has been deleted.

properties.name: config.map-api-url
properties.description: The URL of the map API to use.

properties.name: cors.urls
properties.description: CSV list of URLs to allow CORS for.

properties.name: cors.methods
properties.description: CSV list of HTTP methods to allow CORS for.
